description: Houses - Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Tyrell, Tully, Greyjoy, and Stark. Feel free to request a house not made yet. If you want another color available, other than Black, White, or Dark Purple, simply ask me, but please specify a HEX color. Theme Tutorial
